characters.name: Brunhilde
characters.description:
__Species__: Demigod

Brunhilde is the eldest of the 13 Valkyrie Sisters and the main protagonist of the series.

She is the one who chose humanity's finest and strongest warriors in Ragnarok to stand up against the strongest gods in combat and slay them in an attempt to save Humanity.

characters.name: Göll
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demigod

Göll is the youngest of the 13 Valkyrie Sisters and the deuteragonist of the series. During the Ragnarok matches, she is usually seen with Brunhilde anxiously watching each match.

She's usually anxious and worried about many things to the point that it gets on Brunhilde's and Hrist's nerves. Whenever humanity's warriors die, she cries and mourns each of her sisters as they die with them.
As an apprentice valkyrie, she doesn't seem all that interested in saving humanity compared to worrying about her sisters.

characters.name: Adam
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Affiliation:__ Humanity

Adam was a very calm, collected, and carefree individual; speaking to Zeus in a very casual manner, much to the chagrin of the other gods present.
We later find out that Adam holds no grudge against heaven, despite the fact the Serpent assaulted Eve and then framed her when he was elsewhere, resulting in humanity's banishment from Eden. However, at the same time, he did not hesitate to kill the Serpent the moment he attacked them.

Adam loved Eve, so much so that he abandoned the paradise of Eden without a second thought when his wife was banished.

Adam displayed selflessness to the highest degree, pushing himself past his limits in his fight against a god to give humanity a bit of hope. Adam's love for his children was strong enough that, even in a battle for his life, he only thought of protecting humanity from anyone who'd try and do them harm. 

~!He fights on humanity's side in the 2nd round in Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Thor
characters.description:
__Species:__ God
__Affiliation:__ Gods

Similar to Lü Bu, Thor is a battle maniac and takes great interest in fighting; especially with strong and/or worthy opponents. Furthermore, he only shows happiness and joy in combat, displaying his finest smile in the first round of Ragnarok. Thor is also a man of few words, not speaking unless absolutely necessary or when in combat. He often does not show this and has a more stoic and aloof expression on his face most of the time, making him seem unapproachable to others.

Thor is the Gods' representative in the first round of Ragnarok.

characters.name: Odin
characters.description: Supreme god of Nordic.

characters.name: Zeus
characters.description:
__Species:__ God
__Affiliation:__ Gods

Zeus is a prominent deity and the Supreme God in the Greek Pantheon. He is also the chairman of the Gods' Council and often referred to as the "God Father of Cosmos"

When addressing his fellow gods, Zeus is extremely calm and authoritative while possessing a very formal and wise disposition. Like most gods, Zeus holds his own kind to a superior and extremely high standard, always expecting them to win no matter the odds, and seething with anger when they lose to humans. Zeus is also an eccentric individual, having random exaggerated emotional outbursts, breaking into a dance at the start of the second round of Ragnarok in front of everyone present, even being called the most shameful god by Hermes.

However, after several rounds of Ragnarok passed, Zeus became more humble, even acknowledging Humanity's strength. He is also extremely faithful and confident in those of the Greek Pantheon.

Zeus is the Gods' representative in the second round of Ragnarok.

characters.name: Poseidon
characters.description:
The third competitor for the god's in Record of Ragnarok.
He is a prominent deity in the Greek Pantheon as the God of the Seas.

characters.name: Hrist
characters.description:
__Species__: Demigod

Hrist is the second of the Valkyrie sisters. ~!She forms a Völundr with [Kojirou Sasaki](https://anilist.co/character/140646/Kojirou-Sasaki).!~

characters.name: Randgriz
characters.description:
__Species__: Demigod

Randgriz is the fourth of the Valkyrie sisters. ~!She forms a Völundr with [Lü Bu](https://anilist.co/character/140645).!~

characters.name: Reginleif
characters.description:
__Species__: Demigod

Reginleif is the seventh of the Valkyrie sisters. ~!She forms a Völundr with [Adam](https://anilist.co/character/140637/Adam).!~

characters.name: Bu Lü
characters.description: Lü Bu, the Flying General was the strongest warrior of The Three Kingdoms. ~!Humanity's vanguard and representative in the first round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Kojirou Sasaki
characters.description: Kojiro Sasaki's a famous swordsman from Japan, known as "History's Greatest Loser". ~!Kojiro Sasaki is Humanity's representative in the third round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Hermes
characters.description: Messenger of the gods.

characters.name: Loki
characters.description: God of deceit.

characters.name: Ares
characters.description: Ares is the 6th of the 12 Gods of Olympus and the Greek God of War.

characters.name: Shiva
characters.description: The God of destruction and one of the principal deities of Hinduism.

characters.name: Heimdall
characters.description: The watchman of the apocalypse.

characters.name: Heracles
characters.description: God's fourth in Ragnarok.

characters.name: Jack the Ripper
alt_names: ジャック・ザ・リッパー
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Affiliation:__ Humanity 

Jack the Ripper, or Jack, is an infamous serial killer hailing from late 19th century Britain.

Normally, Jack has the disposition of a typical British Gentlemen, accentuated by his sophisticated diction and actions. However, Jack is a true sadist and monster at heart, being considered by most to be a person shrouded in malice and evil, murdering people as he considers the fear they feel before death to be absolutely beautiful. ~!Jack the Ripper is Humanity's representative in the fourth round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Hlökk
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demigod

Hlökk is the eleventh of the Valkyrie sisters.~!She forms a Völundr with [Jack the Ripper](https://anilist.co/character/159840/Jack-the-Ripper).!~

characters.name: Souji Okita
characters.description: Captain of the first unit of the Shinsengumi. ~!Souji Okita is Humanity's representative in the tenth round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Isami Kondou
characters.description: A Japanese swordsman and official of the late Edo period.

characters.name: Prudr
characters.description: Third of the Valkyrie sisters and Raiden Tameemon's Volund during Ragnarok.

characters.name: Raiden Tameemon
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Affiliation:__ Humanity

Raiden Tameemon, born Tarōkochi Seki, is Humanity's representative in the fifth round of Ragnarok.

Göll described Raiden as the "incarnation of desire", being shown as a perverted and lustful man when around beautiful women. Despite this, he claims that he's always completely serious about any statement he makes.

Growing up as child, Raiden was viewed a monster by many other kids and became depressed, his mother would encourage him to use his strength for the good of the weak and always hugged him with love. From that day, Raiden took his mother's words to heart and used his strength to help the villagers around him. When the "Great Tenmei Famine" began, Raiden became saddened by the death and suffering occuring all over his village and so decided to become a sumo wrestler to raise money for his hometown.

It is said that Raiden has the strongest muscles in human history and was considered to be the best of all time.

characters.name: Bishamonten
characters.description: The Shinto God of Fortune in war and battles. He is also the leader and strongest member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Buddha
characters.description:
__Species:__ God, Human (formerly)
~!Affiliation: Humanity!~

Buddha has an easygoing attitude and does not seem to take anything seriously. 
His confidence is great enough for him to challenge Zeus to his face by claiming that the only one who can push him around in "all of heaven and Earth" is himself. Buddha also appears to have a sweet tooth as he was seen eating lollipops when walking and eating chocolates while relaxing.
Buddha also seems to display respect for other people by offering them foods he's currently eating, like when he didn't allow Zeus to steal one of his sweets, but offered his popcorn to Brunhilde.

~!The human's representative for round 6!~

characters.name: Simo Häyhä
characters.description: Simo Häyhä, nicknamed "The White Death", is a Finnish sniper. He is believed to have killed over 500 men during the 1939–40 Winter War. He's set to fight in a future match of Ragnarok.

characters.name: Rudra
characters.description: Rudra is the Hindu god of storms and the dear friend of Shiva, who is participating in the fifth round of Ragnarök.

characters.name: Abel
characters.description: Abel is the second son of Adam and Eve. He was supporting and watching his father fight against Zeus.

characters.name: Aphrodite
characters.description: Aphrodite is the Greek goddess of beauty.

characters.name: Arthur  Conan Doyle
alt_names: アーサー・コナン・ドイル
characters.description: Arthur Conan Doyle is a famous novelist who created the Sherlock Holmes series.

characters.name: Adamas
characters.description: Adamas was the Greek god of conquest and was once part of the 13 gods of Olympus, now reduced to 12 since his death. He was killed and expunged from history by his younger brother, Poseidon.

characters.name: Gong Chen
characters.description: Chen Gong is a strategist from the Lu Bu's army. Like the rest of the Lu Bu's men, he is very loyal and passionate about him.

characters.name: Benzaiten
characters.description: Benzaiten is the Japanese god of fortune in music, arts, and knowledge. She is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Castor
characters.description: Castor is the childhood friend of Heracles.

characters.name: Cain
characters.description: Cain is the first son of Adam and Eve. He was supporting and watching his father fight against Zeus.

characters.name: Cao Cao
characters.description: Cao Cao was a Chinese warlord during the Three Kingdoms period.

characters.name: Ebisu
characters.description: Ebisu is the Japanese god of fortune in fishing and trading. He is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Durga
characters.description: Hindu Goddess of War. She is Shiva's third wife.

characters.name: Eve
characters.description: Eve is the wife of Adam, who was falsely accused by The Serpent of eating the apple from the Tree of Knowledge.

characters.name: Yue Fang
characters.description: Fang Yue was a general of Wang Kuang.

characters.name: Fukurokuju
characters.description: Fukurokuju is the Japanese god of fortune in wealth and happiness. He is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Genpaku Sugita
characters.description: Sugita Genpaku was a Japanese physician.

characters.name: Iori Miyamoto
characters.description: Iori Miyamoto is the son of Musashi Miyamoto.He objected over Sakaki representing humanity due to him losing to his father.

characters.name: Jack Smith
characters.description: Jack Smith was a British writer and the father of Jack The Ripper.

characters.name: Kagehisa Itou Ittousai
characters.description: Kagehisa Itou Ittousai was famous swordsman who founded the Ito-ryu school of sword fighting.

characters.name: Juroujin
characters.description: Juroujin is the Japanese god of fortune in longevity. He is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Hokusai Katsushika
characters.description: Hokusai Katsushika is an artist that lived in Edo period.

characters.name: Kali
characters.description: Kali is the Hindu goddess of death, time, and the end of the world.She is Shiva's second wife, who is participating in the fifth round of Ragnarök.

characters.name: Kisaburo  Onogawa
characters.description: Kisaburo Onogawa is sumo wrestler recognized as the fifth yokozuna

characters.name: Seigen Toda
characters.description: Seigen Toda was known as the Master of the Kodachi and founder of the Toda Style.

characters.name: Sekishusai  Yagyu
characters.description: Sekishusai Yagyu was a famous samurai who mastered the Yagyu Shinkage-ryū school of combat.

characters.name: Kajinosuke  Tanikaze
characters.description: Kajinosuke Tanikaze is sumo wrestler recognized as the fourth yokozuna.

characters.name: Mary
characters.description: Mary was a prostitute and the mother of Jack the Ripper.

characters.name: William  Shakespeare
alt_names: ウィリアム・シェイクスピア
characters.description: William Shakespeare was an English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world's greatest dramatist.

characters.name: Michelangelo
characters.description: Michelangelo is an Italian sculptor, painter, architect and poet of the High Renaissance born in the Republic of Florence.

characters.name: Parvati
characters.description:
Parvati is the Hindu goddess of fertility, love, and beauty. She is Shiva's first* wife.

~!* In the native Japanese manga she is marked as Shiva's first wife, but in translations she is marked as his second. Reason being that according to Hindu Lore, Parvati's previous past life was Sati, who was Shiva's first wife or lover. However, she immolated herself due to her father Daksha's disapproval of their marriage. Shiva would then wait for Sati to reincarnate as Parvati, who would officially became his second wife.!~

characters.name: Nobutsuna Kamiizumi
characters.description: Nobutsuna "Sword Saint" Kamiizumi was a famous samurai who created the Shinkage-ryū school of combat. He was Sekishusai Yagyu's teacher.

characters.name: Jian Sun
characters.description: Sun Jian known as The Tiger of Jiang Dong was a military general and warlord who lived during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China. He allied himself with Yuan Shu in 190 when warlords from eastern China formed a coalition to oust Dong Zhuo, a tyrannical warlord who held the puppet Emperor Xian in his power

characters.name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
characters.description: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart is a prolific and influential composer of the classical era.

characters.name: Shihuang Qin
characters.description: Qin Shi Huang was the founder of the Qin Dynasty and the first emperor to unify China. His real name is Ying Zheng. Qin Shi Huang, also known as Shi Huang Di, literally means "First Emperor of Qin". He is widely regarded as the greatest Chinese emperor of all time despite sometimes being viewed as a tyrant.

characters.name: Muninn
characters.description: Muninn is one of the pair of ravens that accompany Odin.

characters.name: Hades
characters.description:
__Species:__ God
__Affiliation:__ Gods

He is the current God of the Underworld also known as Helheim.

characters.name: Beelzebub
characters.description:
__Species__: God
__Affiliation:__ Gods

Beelzebub is a prominent deity in the Philistine Pantheon and Abrahamic Pantheon. He is also the Lord of the Flies.
~!Beelzebub is the God's representative in the 8th round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Hajun
alt_names: Demon Lord of the Sixth Heaven
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demon
~!Affiliation: Gods!~

Hajun is the legendary berserker of the Underworld (Helheim) and the Demon Lord of the Sixth Heaven.

~!Previously the God of Misfortune, Zerofuku. Hajun appeared when Zerofuku was devoured by two dragons, becoming the second representative for the Gods in the sixth round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Zerofuku
characters.description:
~!Affiliation: Gods!~

The God of Misfortune.

~!He is also the fusion of the Seven Lucky Gods, being their original form before splitting up in the past.!~

~!The Gods' representative for round 6, taking the place of Bishamonten.!~

characters.name: Michel Nostradamus
alt_names: ミシェル・ノストラダムス
characters.description: Michel is one of the Einherjar set to fight in a future match of Ragnarok. He is regarded as the prophet of the century. He is also described as the "most obnoxious man in all of history".

characters.name: Nikola Tesla
characters.description:
Nikola Tesla is the 8th fighter for Humanity in the Ragnarok Tournament. He is a scientist just like his real life counterpart.
He doesn't believe in things like magic or gods, claiming they are just laws of Physics. 
His volund is 9th of the Valkerye sisters, Gondoul.

characters.name: Jesus
characters.description:
Jesus is the Son of God and one of Buddha's supporters. He is one of the Four Sages alongside Buddha, Socrates and Confucius.

He is the central figure of Christianity, the world's largest religion.

For the most part, Jesus remains calm and stoic, not showing much reaction except under extreme moments.

characters.name: Daikokuten
characters.description: Daikokuten is the Shinto god of fortune in cooking, farming and banking. He is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Hoteison
characters.description: Hoteison is the Shinto god of fortune in businesses and plenitude. He is a member of the Seven Lucky Gods.

characters.name: Nishumbha
characters.description: Ashura and younger brother of Shumbha.

characters.name: Brahma
characters.description: Hindu god of creation. He and Vishnu fought against Shiva and Rudra during the latters' journey to the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Shumbha
characters.description: Ashura and older brother of Nishumbha.

characters.name: Vishnu
characters.description: Hindu God of Preservation. He fought alongside Brahma against Shiva and Rudra on the latters' journey to the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Ganesha
characters.description: Son of Shiva, Ganesha is the Hindu god of success, wisdom, and new beginnings. He is also known as the Remover of Obstacles.

characters.name: Sakata Kintoki
characters.description: Sakata Kintoki is one of the Einherjar.

characters.name: Marie Curie
characters.description: Marie Curie is a Polish physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity.

characters.name: Galileo Galilei
characters.description: Galileo Galilei is an Italian astronomer, physicist and engineer, who many regards as the Father of modern science.

characters.name: Albert Einstein
alt_names: アルベルト・アインシュタイン
characters.description: Albert Einstein is a German physicist renowned as one of the greatest and most influential physicists of all time.

characters.name: Alfred Nobel
alt_names: アルフレッド・ノーベル
characters.description: Alfred Nobel is a Swedish chemist, engineer, inventor, businessman, and philanthropist. He is best known for the Nobel Prize, holding 355 patents in his lifetime and the invention of the dynamite.

characters.name: Lilith
characters.description: Lilith was a Goddess that helped Beelzebub in his quest to find and kill Satan.

characters.name: Azazel
characters.description: Azazel was an angel that once resided within Heaven. He was Beelzebub's friend.

characters.name: Lucifer
characters.description: Lucifer was an angel that once resided within Heaven. He was Beelzebub's first friend.

characters.name: Samael
characters.description: Samael was an angel that once resided within Heaven. He was Beelzebub's friend.

characters.name: Apollo
characters.description:
Apollo is a prominent deity within the Greek Pantheon. He is known as the "Sun God" and is a part of the Twelve Gods of Olympus. 

~!Apollo is the Gods' representative in the ninth round of Ragnarok!~

characters.name: Dane Tesla
characters.description: Dane Tesla is the older brother of [Nikola Tesla](https://anilist.co/character/284632/Nikola-Tesla). He was a brilliant inventor in his own right.

characters.name: Haggis
characters.description: Haggis was a Spartan soldier that followed [Leonidas](https://anilist.co/character/341135/Leonidas) into the Battle of Thermopylae.

characters.name: Chun Yan
characters.description: Chun Yan was the caretaker and bodyguard of [Qin Shi Huang](https://anilist.co/character/203633/Shihuang-Qin).

characters.name: Siegfried
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demigod

Siegfried is a demigod who was imprisoned in Tartarus after Odin discovered that he was the Primordial Vessel, the key to the resurrection of the Four Primordial Gods. He is also the boyfriend of [Brunhilde](https://anilist.co/character/140636/Brunhilde).

characters.name: Golnir
characters.description:
__Species__: Primordial God

Golnir was one of the 77 primordial gods who fought against the Eleven God-Slayers, and one of the seven primordial gods who survived Ragnarok. He is [Eirin](https://anilist.co/character/381273/Eirin)'s husband. 

He created the artifact “Gleipnir,” which was used to seal the Eleven Pillars, including the Four Primordial Pillars (Yggdrasil). He is also the author of the Book of Golnir, a record that reveals the hidden history of Ragnarok, which would later be discovered by [Beelzebub](https://anilist.co/character/252554/Beelzebub).

characters.name: Eirin
characters.description:
__Species__: Primordial God

Eirin was one of the 77 primordial gods who fought against the eleven God-Slayers, and one of the seven primordial gods who survived Ragnarok. She is [Golnir](https://anilist.co/character/381166/Golnir)'s wife

characters.name: Izanagi
characters.description:
__Species:__ Primordial God

Izanagi is the God of Creation. He was one of the 77 primordial gods who fought against the Eleven God-Slayers, and one of the seven primordial gods who survived Ragnarok.

characters.name: Amaterasu Ookami
characters.description: Amaterasu Ookami is one of the Three Noble Gods and the Great Sun Goddess.

characters.name: Tsukuyomi Mikoto
alt_names: Tsukuyomi no Mikoto (ツクヨミノミコト)
characters.description: Tsukuyomi Mikoto is one of the Three Noble Gods and the Moon God.

characters.name: Anubis
characters.description: Anubis is a deity of Ancient Egypt.

characters.name: Razgriz
characters.description:
__Species__: Demigod

Razgriz is the twelfth of the 13 Valkyrie sisters. ~!She forms a Völundr with [Simo Häyhä](https://anilist.co/character/188828) during the eleventh round of Ragnarok.!~

characters.name: Python
characters.description: Python is a serpent-like monster that was shunned by both the Gods and Humans for his appearance. It is said in legend that he was slain by [Apollo](https://anilist.co/character/321730/Apollo) but in actuality, Apollo befriended the serpent and was the only one who accepted him as being beautiful, not for his looks, but for his soul. Python would be the one to build the Temple of Apollo in Delphi, engraving it with the words, "Know Thyself."

characters.name: Chi You
characters.description: Chi You is a demon god from ancient China who appears in various forms throughout early Chinese mythology and classical texts. He was revered as the God of War and as the inventor of the Five Bronze Weapons. In the ancient ritual tradition, only the emperor who had received the Mandate of Heaven was permitted to ascend the sacred mountain and perform the sealing rites dedicated to Chi You. In China, the right to be king had to be granted by Chi You himself. He was defeated by [Qin Shi Huang](https://anilist.co/character/203633/Shihuang-Qin) in 219 BC.

characters.name: Flauros
characters.description: Flauros is a guard of Tartarus and the 64th demon of Solomon’s 72 Pillars. He serves in Helheim, within Tartarus, and is one of the jailers responsible for [Siegfried](https://anilist.co/character/368799/Siegfried).

characters.name: Andras
characters.description: Andras is a guard of Tartarus and the 63rd demon of Solomon’s 72 Pillars. He serves in Helheim, within Tartarus, and is one of the jailers responsible for [Siegfried](https://anilist.co/character/368799/Siegfried).

characters.name: Verk
characters.description: Verk was a member of the people of Golnir. ~!He discovered the Calamity Treasure, the magic sword Gram, and by obtaining it he would become the future [Odin](https://anilist.co/character/140639/Odin).!~

characters.name: Ferdis
characters.description: Ferdis is [Golnir](https://anilist.co/character/381166)’s first disciple.

characters.name: Hajime Saitou
characters.description: A Japanese samurai of the late Edo period, who later became captain of the third unit of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Toshizou Hijikata
characters.description: Vice-Commander of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Varuna
characters.description: Hindu God of Water. He fought alongside Agni against Shiva and Rudra during the latters' journey to Svarga.

characters.name: Yohachi Urakaze
characters.description: Sumo wrestler

characters.name: Agni
characters.description: Hindu God of Fire. He fought with Varuna against Shiva and Rudra during the latter's journey to the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Indra
characters.description: Indra is the Hindu god of lightning and one of the participants in the Gods' Apocalypse tournament to claim the final spot in Ragnarok.

characters.name: Shinpachi Nagakura
characters.description: Shinpachi Nagakura was the captain of the second division of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Kai Shimada
characters.description: Kai Shimada served as an inspector and officer in charge of member records in the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Keisuke Yamanami
characters.description: Keisuke Yamanami was the vice-commander of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Heisuke Toudou
characters.description: Heisuke Toudou was the captain of the Eighth Unit of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Yasutsuna Houki
characters.description: Yasutsuna Houki is a master swordsmith whose representative work is the blade Dōjigiri Yasutsuna.

characters.name: Kunitsuna Awataguchi
characters.description: Kunitsuna Awataguchi is a master swordsmith whose representative work is the blade Onimaru Kunitsuna.

characters.name: Munechika Sanjou
characters.description: Munechika Sanjou is a master swordsmith whose representative work is the blade Mikazuki Munechika.

characters.name: Butesha
characters.description: Butesha is the Lord of the Demons. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Mahatapas
characters.description: Mahatapas is the Great Ascetic. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Muritoinjaya
characters.description: Muritoinjaya is the One Who Overcame Death. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Sharubeija
characters.description: Sharubeija is the Winged Lion. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Trilochano
alt_names: The One Who Has Three Eyes
characters.description: Trilochano is the One Who Has Three Eyes. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Hara
characters.description: Hara is the One Who Takes Away. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Gangadara
characters.description: Gangadara is the One Who Supports the Ganges. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Nagakundara
characters.description: Nagakundara is the One Who Wears Snakes as a Necklace. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Trilochana
characters.description: Trilochana is the One Who Possesses a Corpse-Like Body. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Amarnaat
characters.description: Amarnaat is the Lord of Immortality. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Maheshvara
characters.description: Maheshvara is the Great King. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Acharanata
characters.description: Acharanata is the Unmoving One. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Ishana
characters.description: Ishana is the One Who Rules. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Mahakala
characters.description: Mahakala is the Great Darkness, the One Who Rules Time and Death. He was defeated during Shiva and Rudra’s journey to reach the peak of Svarga.

characters.name: Genzaburou Inoue
characters.description: Genzaburou Inoue was the captain of the Sixth Division of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Eisaburou Abiru
characters.description: Eisaburou Abiru was a member of the Mibu Roshigumi.

characters.name: Sanosuke Harada
characters.description: Sanosuke Harada was the captain of the tenth division of the Shinsengumi.

characters.name: Kanayakoshin
characters.description: Kanayakoshin is the Goddess of Blacksmithing.

characters.name: Hephaestus
characters.description: Hephaestus is the God of Fire and Blacksmithing.

characters.name: Xerxes I
characters.description: Xerxes I was the fourth king of the Achaemenid Persian Empire.

characters.name: Gaia
characters.description: __Species__: Primordial God

characters.name: Hanjiro Nakamura
characters.description: Hanjiro Nakamura was one of the Four Great Manslayers of the Bakumatsu.

characters.name: Gensai Kawakami
characters.description: Gensai Kawakami was one of the Four Great Manslayers of the Bakumatsu.

characters.name: Shinbei Tanaka
characters.description: Shinbei Tanaka was one of the Four Great Manslayers of the Bakumatsu.

characters.name: Izo Okada
characters.description: Izo Okada was one of the Four Great Manslayers of the Bakumatsu.

characters.name: Bang Liu
characters.description: Bang Liu was the first emperor of the Former Han Dynasty.

characters.name: Che Liu
characters.description: Che Liu was the seventh emperor of the Former Han Dynasty.

characters.name: Yuanzhang Zhu
characters.description: Yuanzhang Zhu was the first emperor of the Ming Dynasty.
